context.detailarmorbar.effects.effect_ty: Changes the type of protection enchantment effect.
Display an aura on the armor bar.
Display an outline on the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.effects.effect_sp: Changes the effect speed for protection effect and low durability warn.
context.detailarmorbar.effects.thorn.sta: No animations when attack entity by thorn.
context.detailarmorbar.effects.thorn.ani: Flashing animations when attack entity by thorn.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.enchantmen: Displays the protection enchantment effect on the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.netherites: When equipped netherite armor, the armor bar in that area changes to netherite armor texture.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.thorns: If the armor has a thorn enchantment, it will display a thorn overlay on the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.durability: A warning effect will be displayed if any of the equipped armor has durability of 8% or less.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.mending: If the armor is repaired by repair, the repair effect is displayed on the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.armor_type: Changes the armor bar to match the texture of the equipped armor. (You will on or off this, It does not affect netherite armor bar.)
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.item_types: When a special item is equipped, it is displayed on the armor bar. (e.g. elytra)
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.vanilla_te: Displays armor bars with vanilla-style textures. When OFF, displays better texture but different with original. credit: Heamaci, snessim
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.compatible: Makes it compatible with mods that health is displayed as a single line. Prevents the armor bar moving upwards.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.inverse_sl: Reverses the slot order of the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.sort_speci: Sort special items (like Elytra) to the right on armor bar.
